description: Custom React hook for managing CRUD operations on a 'tasks' table via Supabase, including fetching, creating, updating, and deleting tasks with optional filtering by user ID and date.

methods.name: getTasks
methods.description: Fetches tasks with optional filters for user ID and date, orders by date descending.

methods.name: createTask
methods.description: Creates a new task with provided details and adds it to the current task list.

methods.name: updateTask
methods.description: Updates an existing task identified by ID with new data.

methods.name: deleteTask
methods.description: Deletes a task by ID from the database and updates local state.
